projects.name: Sonar Rock vs Mine Prediction Model
projects.description: Created a machine learning model to classify sonar data into rocks or mines, enhancing detection accuracy. Utilized Python for preprocessing and model evaluation, boosting the models performance.

projects.name: Travel Booking Website
projects.description: Developed a travel booking interface with location and date selection, improving user interaction. Applied machine learning for personalized recommendations, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for responsiveness.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Implemented a C++ application for library operations including checkouts and inventory management. Designed a robust system architecture, improving data handling and user experience.

experiences.description: Promoted Mood Indigo at my college, successfully increasing student engagement by 30% and organizing key events for Indias largest cultural festival. Coordinated with cross-functional teams to execute promotional activities, leading to a 20% increase in event participation. Developed and implemented strategies to enhance festival visibility, including social media campaigns and campus outreach.

Enhanced website functionality by implementing responsive design techniques using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, resulting in a 15% improvement in user engagement. Developed and optimized web features to improve user experience and site performance, contributing to a 10% reduction in page load times. Collaborated with development teams to troubleshoot and resolve issues, ensuring smooth operation and minimal downtime.

Applied HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills to enhance web applications, leading to a 25% increase in site functionality and user satisfaction. Assisted in debugging and optimizing code to improve website performance, resulting in a 20% reduction in error rates. Contributed to the development of new features and enhancements, aligning with project requirements and timelines.
